--- alter_table_drop_synonym.sql
ALTER TABLE Singers DROP SYNONYM SingersTest
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 19,
    Name:    "Singers",
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.DropSynonym{
    Drop: 20,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 33,
      NameEnd: 44,
      Name:    "SingersTest",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE Singers DROP SYNONYM SingersTest
